con:call.name: Request 1
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ser="http://services.trustvesta.com/MobilityUS_Service/Service">\r <soapenv:Header/>\r <soapenv:Body>\r <ser:ChargeOrderPrepareWithNewCardRequest>\r <!--You may enter the following 13 items in any order-->\r <ser:SessionKey>?</ser:SessionKey>\r <ser:ChargeAccountNumber>?</ser:ChargeAccountNumber>\r <ser:ChargeExpirationMMYY>?</ser:ChargeExpirationMMYY>\r <ser:PDFirstName>?</ser:PDFirstName>\r <ser:PDLastName>?</ser:PDLastName>\r <ser:PDAddressLine1>?</ser:PDAddressLine1>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:PDAddressLine2>?</ser:PDAddressLine2>\r <ser:PDCity>?</ser:PDCity>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:PDRegion>?</ser:PDRegion>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:PDPostalCode>?</ser:PDPostalCode>\r <ser:PDCountryCode>?</ser:PDCountryCode>\r <ser:ChargeOrderPrepareWithNewCard_LineItemsRows>\r <!--Zero or more repetitions:-->\r <ser:ChargeOrderPrepareWithNewCard_LineItems>\r <!--You may enter the following 3 items in any order-->\r <ser:Amount>?</ser:Amount>\r <ser:ProductTypeCD>?</ser:ProductTypeCD>\r <ser:ProductCode>?</ser:ProductCode>\r </ser:ChargeOrderPrepareWithNewCard_LineItems>\r </ser:ChargeOrderPrepareWithNewCard_LineItemsRows>\r <!--Optional:-->\r <ser:OriginatingIPAddress>?</ser:OriginatingIPAddress>\r </ser:ChargeOrderPrepareWithNewCardRequest>\r </soapenv:Body>\r </soapenv:Envelope>
